scripts.build_all_but_image: cd ../deid && pyinstaller --clean --noconfirm manage.spec && pyinstaller --clean --noconfirm processor.spec && pyinstaller --clean --noconfirm initialize_admin_password.spec && cd .. && cp -r dist/icore_processor electron/assets/dist/ && cd electron && cp ../deid/home/settings.json assets && cp -r ../deid/dist/* assets/dist/ && electron-packager . iCore --platform=$(node -p "process.platform") --arch=$(node -p "process.arch") --icon=assets/icon.icns --overwrite
scripts.build: cd ../deid && pyinstaller --clean --noconfirm manage.spec && pyinstaller --clean --noconfirm processor.spec && pyinstaller --clean --noconfirm initialize_admin_password.spec && cd .. && cp -r dist/icore_processor electron/assets/dist/ && cd electron && cp ../deid/home/settings.json assets && cp -r ../deid/dist/* assets/dist/ && electron-packager . iCore --platform=$(node -p "process.platform") --arch=$(node -p "process.arch") --icon=assets/icon.icns --overwrite
